long_description: Bring the compact and easily packabale Marmot Precip shell gloves on light and fast adventures in cold weather to help keep your hands dry and warm so you can stay happy. Ripstop nylon shell fabric and MemBrain(R) waterproof, breathable inserts help keep hands dry. Soft and comfortable DriClime(R) brushed tricot lining pulls moisture away from the skin. Gloves are sized to fit over fleece liner gloves (not included). Articulated fingers and thumbs; one-hand-adjustable gauntlet drawcords; safety leashes. Closeout.
short_description: Bring the compact and easily packabale Marmot Precip shell gloves on light and fast adventures in cold weather to help keep your hands dry and warm so you can stay happy.
